title: 2/3 Augment Cache, RITO PLIS T-T
body:
I'm not sure if this is the right place to request something like this, Ive contacted customer care and they said there's nothing they can do so I'm just trying last ditch attempt here- I need to gift myself an Augment cache... 

Yous see I have an account that unfortunately has all my RP and one that I actually use, this means I cant complete that last Augment cache because rito made it that you can only get 5 and not 6 Augment shards to make Augment Caches without spending RP. So here I am fallen victim to this elusive trappp (not that I don't like the hole Project, I love this project thingie <3) but I I want to buy that Augment cache and I have the RP just on another account

Sooo I humbly ask that the masterminds within rito finds a way that I can gift myself an augment cache or better yet move my RP from one account to another.
 (if there's another place I should be posting this rather than here please do tell me)

replies.body:
No hextech content, such as hextech chests or augmented caches or fragments can be gifted. There's actually no guaranteed way to get another augmented cache fragment, as the chances are completely random as with all hextech crafting. So be aware that opening another augmented cache cannot guarantee you'll instantly get another fragment. 

Additionally, RP balance cannot be transferred between accounts.

Check out our [Event Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210155266-PROJECT-DISRUPTION-FAQ) for complete deets. Let me know if you have any other questions.
